description:
A swiss army knife for your external drive needs

Zentimo offers a new way to manage your USB & eSATA devices. While it solves many external drive related problems in Windows, it also gives more control and makes working with external drives fun & pleasure.
Key Features:
Fast & Reliable Safe Device Removal: Lets you stop a device, display locking processes, or reconnect a stopped device.
Portable App Quick Launcher: Lets you launch any application located on your external drive with one click.
Powerful Autorun: Can automatically mount\dismount your TrueCrypt drive, launch a file manager, check flash drives for viruses and run anything else on device connection/disconnection.
Drive Letter Management: The program hides drive letters of unused card reader slots, can assign drive letters to a specific device, and much more...
Honest Drive Speed Test: Perform read/write speed tests for any attached drive.
Encrypted Volumes Management: Work with an encrypted by TrueCrypt, CipherShed or VeraCrypt container as if it's a device volume.
This is a small update that includes ability to reorder autorun items, displaying of more types of devices and bug fix.

Reorder autorun items
Now it’s possible to change order of the autorun list items by dragging them with a mouse. Also you can copy an item instead of move by holding Ctrl button while you are dragging the item.
More types of devices is displayed
Now the program displays additional types of devices, e.g. Thunderbolt eGPU
Bug fix
- The program displayed fixed storage devices despite the option “Display all storage devices” is off
- “Unable to stop” dialog displayed every time on device disabling, even when the action completed successfully
Other improvements
- Czech language support returned
How to update from the previous version?
Just download and install the required installer over the previous version. You do not need to uninstall the previous version. If your license upgrade period is over, feel free to purchase the renewal.
